name: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?!
description:
Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?! is a wacky action RPG where YOU'RE the hero! Cook, craft, and toss around epic weapons, barrels of poison, and more as you fulfil your destiny!

The Village, the first line of defence against the mysterious, monster-filled portal world, has been overrun! As a novice hero with just one skill in particular, it’s up to you to rescue your spud allies and lead them on a grand journey.

Rebuild the Village and manage it, craft hundreds of weird weapons for your arsenal, and collect recipes to cook varied delicacies so you can fight with a satisfied tummy.

Key Features:

  • Enjoy a spud-tacular, light-hearted tale about our intrepid hero (that’s you!)
  • Rescue different heroes and villagers from the hands of the omnipotent (also possibly incompetent) Peelzebub!
  • Battle against all kinds of otherworldly monsters (although, have you considered how they feel about YOU?)
  • Unlock interesting weapons and combine them for unique playstyles (no two combos are the same!)
  • Search for blueprints to unlock new weapons, features, and keep growing the Village! (after all, that’s capitalism!)
